title: Replace existing CV with newly uploaded file

requirements.summary: Replace the existing CV file with the newly uploaded CV file while maintaining the same filename and path
acceptanceCriteria: The old CV file is removed from frontend/public/assets/
The new CV file is placed at frontend/public/assets/Engr. Jerry E. Osiobe CV.pdf
The download link in HeroSection component continues to work with the same filename path

file_operations.description: Remove the existing CV file from the assets directory

Add the newly uploaded CV file (NEW CV 2026.pdf from the assets list) to the assets directory with the exact filename 'Engr. Jerry E. Osiobe CV.pdf' to maintain compatibility with the existing download link in HeroSection component
